profile_group_id.description: ID of the profile group of fields that have profile fields

hide_empty_groups.description: Whether to hide profile groups of fields that do not have any profile fields or not.

user_id.description: Required if you want to load a specific user's data.

member_type.description: Limit fields by those restricted to a given member type, or array of member types. If `$user_id` is provided, the value of `$member_type` will be overridden by the member types of the provided user. The special value of 'any' will return only those fields that are unrestricted by member type - i.e., those applicable to any type.

hide_empty_fields.description: Whether to hide profile fields where the user has not provided data or not.

fetch_field_data.description: Whether to fetch data for each field. Requires a $user_id.

fetch_visibility_level.description: Whether to fetch the visibility level for each field.

exclude_groups.description: Ensure result set excludes specific profile field groups.

exclude_fields.description: Ensure result set excludes specific profile fields.

update_meta_cache.description: Whether to pre-fetch xprofilemeta for all retrieved groups, fields, and data.

parent_id.description: The ID of the parent field.

type.description: The type for the profile field.

description.description: The description of the profile field.

is_required.description: Whether the profile field must have a value.

can_delete.description: Whether the profile field can be deleted or not.

field_order.description: The order of the profile field into the group of fields.

option_order.description: The order of the option into the profile field list of options

order_by.description: The way profile field's options are ordered.

is_default_option.description: Whether the option is the default one for the profile field.

default_visibility.description: Default visibility for the profile field.

allow_custom_visibility.description: Whether to allow members to set the visibility for the profile field data or not.

do_autolink.description: Autolink status for this profile field

width.description: As a percentage of the image, the width to crop the image to. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.

height.description: As a percentage of the image, the height to crop the image to. DEPRECATED: Use `modifiers` instead.
